thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Linda Jackson
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Linda Jackson

author: Linda Jackson
title: Linda Jackson
text: The service for 4 new tires with all wheel alignment took 45minutes. The tires were in stock. I was shown the upgrades available & pricing was fair. I received a discount due to the fact I was a business owner at the time of payment. I saved an unexpected $50. Good deal. Great service. Thanks!
